"Crawford":
"...Can I get an Operator on this?
...You're all busy with other sectors?"
"Alright, I'll handle this sector myself. I'm not used to this, so don't expect anything impressive from me."
"Listen up, everyone. There's been a huge outbreak of activity throughout the Aelio region. We've got a large number of signals in Mt. Magnus as well."
"One of which, according to reports, is expected to be a Nex Aelio signal. I want you to approach the mountain summit with all due vigilance."
